amendatorysection.catchline: No interest for nonpayment of taxes.
amendatorysection.para: In any case where it is determined by the board that the decedent died domiciled in this state, no interest otherwise imposed by sections 77-2010 and 77-2102, for nonpayment of death taxes between the date of the agreement and of filing of the determination of the board as to domicile shall be charged.
